location.address: Computer Deconstruction Lab, Building 9059, 2201 Marconi Road, Wall Township, N.J. 07719, USA

ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 57. South wind 15 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 60 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
